modmenu.summaryTranslation.tnze-s-ime-mo: A Mod focused on improve IME experience on Windows
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.tnze-s-im:
A Mod focused on improve IME experience on Windows。
The goal of this mod is to become the most perfect input method mod you can find on Windows.

The technology used in this mod is extremely advanced, and it requires at least Java 23 or higher to run.
